text: avarkalu(kkaka anuppappatta nam'mu)taiya tutarkal telivana attatcikalai avarkalitam kontuvanta camayattil (atai avarkal parikacam ceytu nirakarittuvittu, ivvulaka valkkaic campantamakat) tankalitamulla kalvi (tiramaikalaip) parrip perum makilcci ataintiruntarkal. Eninum, (irutiyil) avarkal parikacam ceytu kontiruntatu avarkalaic culntu kontatu
